{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Image = Happyology (Earth-616) from Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 10 001.png | Name = Happyology | EditorialNames = | Aliases = | Leaders = [[McTavish (Earth-616)|McTavish]] | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = [[Elsa Bloodstone (Earth-616)|Elsa Bloodstone]] (Undercover) | Identity = | Affiliation = | Allies = [[Uluath (Earth-616)|Uluath]] | Enemies = [[Elsa Bloodstone (Earth-616)|Elsa Bloodstone]], [[Kei Kawade (Earth-616)|Kid Kaiju]], [[Aegis (Monster) (Earth-616)|Aegis]] | Origin = | Reality = 616 | Status = Defunct | BaseOfOperations = Unnamed yacht; [[Pacific Ocean]] | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = [[City Below the Seas]] | Creators = Justin Jordan; Bachan | First = Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 10 | Quotation = Hryl' G'Hurugh' Nyar' L'Hagopep | Speaker = [[Happyology (Earth-616)|Happyology]] | QuoteSource = Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 10 | History = Founded by [[McTavish (Earth-616)|McTavish]] via the website [[Headscroll.com]], Happyology was formed to bring about the rising of the [[Undergods|Undergod]], [[Uluath (Earth-616)|Uluath]]. Before the rising could take place, however, [[Elsa Bloodstone (Earth-616)|Elsa Bloodstone]] infiltrated the group, unintentionally butt-dialing [[Kei Kawade (Earth-616)|Kid Kaiju]] and [[Aegis (Monster) (Earth-616)|Aegis]] to her aid. While Aegis unwittingly completed the ceremony, summoning the Dread Uluath to the surface, he and Kid Kaiju were able to defeat him in a similar manner to how [[Goom (Earth-616)|Goom]] once defeated [[Pildorr (Earth-616)|Pildorr the Plunderer]], ending Happyology.{{r|Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 10}} | Equipment =
